# The `AVRShiftExpand.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Expand non-8-bit and non-16-bit shift instructions (shl, lshr, ashr) to inline loops, just like avr-gcc. <a href="#details">More...</a>

</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

Expand non-8-bit and non-16-bit shift instructions (shl, lshr, ashr) to inline loops, just like avr-gcc.

This must be done in IR because otherwise the type legalizer will turn 32-bit shifts into (non-existing) library calls such as &#95;&#95;ashlsi3.

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### INITIALIZE&#95;PASS() {#a019fa63f5f129090768a5f61c378b542}

</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;EndBB = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a52c990590792c91dd20b6d45acebe359">splitBasicBlock</a>(BI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;shift.done&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;LoopBB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(Ctx, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;shift.loop&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, EndBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Truncate the shift amount to i8, which is trivially lowered to a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AVR register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.SetInsertPoint(&amp;BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a2d071e661a02790177ba05f62c7c27d1">back</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ShiftAmount = Builder.CreateTrunc(BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(1), Int8Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace the unconditional branch that splitBasicBlock created with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conditional branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Cmp1 = Builder.CreateICmpEQ(ShiftAmount, Int8Zero);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.CreateCondBr(Cmp1, EndBB, LoopBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a2d071e661a02790177ba05f62c7c27d1">back</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the loop body starting with PHI nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.SetInsertPoint(LoopBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;ShiftAmountPHI = Builder.CreatePHI(Int8Ty, 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ShiftAmountPHI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#a089cccb6f231efee72abc76d0f9c695f">addIncoming</a>(ShiftAmount, BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;ValuePHI = Builder.CreatePHI(InputTy, 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ValuePHI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#a089cccb6f231efee72abc76d0f9c695f">addIncoming</a>(BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(0), BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Subtract the shift amount by one, as we&#39;re shifting one this loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iteration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ShiftAmountSub =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Builder.CreateSub(ShiftAmountPHI, ConstantInt::get(Int8Ty, 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ShiftAmountPHI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#a089cccb6f231efee72abc76d0f9c695f">addIncoming</a>(ShiftAmountSub, LoopBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit the actual shift instruction. The difference is that this shift</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction has a constant shift amount, which can be emitted inline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// without a library call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ValueShifted;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator/#a31bf07f3f61525486633bc1d0bbaf029">getOpcode</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Shl:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ValueShifted = Builder.CreateShl(ValuePHI, ConstantInt::get(InputTy, 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::LShr:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ValueShifted = Builder.CreateLShr(ValuePHI, ConstantInt::get(InputTy, 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::AShr:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ValueShifted = Builder.CreateAShr(ValuePHI, ConstantInt::get(InputTy, 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;asked to expand an instruction that is not a shift&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ValuePHI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#a089cccb6f231efee72abc76d0f9c695f">addIncoming</a>(ValueShifted, LoopBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Branch to either the loop again (if there is more to shift) or to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// basic block after the loop (if all bits are shifted).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Cmp2 = Builder.CreateICmpEQ(ShiftAmountSub, Int8Zero);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.CreateCondBr(Cmp2, EndBB, LoopBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Collect the resulting value. This is necessary in the IR but won&#39;t produce</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any actual instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.SetInsertPoint(BI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;Result = Builder.CreatePHI(InputTy, 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Result-&gt;addIncoming(BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(0), BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Result-&gt;addIncoming(ValueShifted, LoopBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace the original shift instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3ab5fc45117b450e8bb04e564cb6e5f2">replaceAllUsesWith</a>(Result);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
